mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TODOLIST WHERE user_id = #{id} and end_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) ORDER BY is_finish ASC, end_date asc, start_date desc, reg_date desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TODOLIST(user_id, content, tag, start_date, end_date, reg_date, mod_date)
VALUES (#{user_id}, #{content}, #{tag}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE TODOLIST SET content = #{content}, tag = #{tag}, start_date = #{start_date}, end_date = #{end_date}, mod_date = NOW() WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE TODOLIST SET is_finish = CASE WHEN is_finish = 0 THEN 1 WHEN is_finish = 1 THEN 0 END WHERE no = #{no};
